thread.title: Sharon
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Sharon

author: Sharon
title: Sharon
text: John was great to work with on our flights to and from Amsterdam. He was very attentive to all steps in the process. Followed up with phone calls and walked me through the online process necessary to finalize the purchase of the tickets. Offered that he would take care of everything related to the flights-he would be available by phone anytime.
